titleStmt.title: A defence of the Scriptures, and the Holy Spirit speaking in them, as the chiefe iudge of controversies of faith ... with a vindication of that honour due to magistrates, ministers, and others ... in a relation of a disputation at Chesterfield in the county of Darby, between some ministers of the Gospell and James Naylor, an erring Quaker ... : with some animadversions upon a lying relation of that disputation, published by Iames Nayler / by Immanuel Bourne ...
titleStmt.author: Bourne, Immanuel, 1590-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
